pkgmetadata.longdescription: Vehicular Emissions by Top-Down Methods // Creates emissions for use in air quality models. Vehicular emissions are estimated by a top-down approach, total emissions are calculated using the statistical description of the fleet of vehicles, the emission is spatially distributed according to satellite images or openstreetmap https://www.openstreetmap.org data and then distributed temporarily (Vara-Vela et al., 2016, doi:10.5194/acp-16-777-2016).
